getAllParts() - Static method in class Model.Inventory
This method retrieves and returns all parts inside the allParts list.
getAllProducts() - Static method in class Model.Inventory
This method retrieves and returns all products inside the allProducts list.
getAssociatedParts() - Method in class Model.Product
This method retrieves and returns the associated parts array list
getAssociatedPartsTable() - Static method in class Controller.AddProductController
This method retrieves and returns the productAssociatedParts array list.

getPartSearchResults() - Method in class Controller.MainFormController
This method extracts the input from the search field and calls the lookUpPart method from the Inventory class and searches through the array list for a match and returns the results to the partTable.
If no results are found an error message is displayed saying no results are found.
getPrice() - Method in class Model.Part
 
getPrice() - Method in class Model.Product
 
getSelectedPart(Part) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
This method populates the texts fields in the modify screen with the selected part's information.
It also gets the index of the selected part and initializes the static variable selectedIndex to be used with updatePart method.
getSelectedProduct(Product) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
This method populates the texts fields in the modify product screen with the selected product's information.
It also gets the index of the selected product and initializes the static variable selectedIndex to be used with updateProduct method.

getStock() - Method in class Model.Product
